title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 461.12 - Responsibilities of the director
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 461.12 - Responsibilities of the director

State Regulations
(a) With respect to Type I and unlisted activities where the Power Authority is the
lead agency, the director shall make the initial determination of significance
or nonsignificance. This determination will take into consideration the
criteria set forth in section
461.18
of this Part, the
information contained in the EAF and any other information which the director
deems necessary to make such determination. (b) If the director determines that an EIS is
required, he shall prepare or cause to be prepared such EIS. (c) Based upon the significance of the action
and/or issues raised by any request for hearing, the director will determine if
a hearing should be held. Any such hearing shall be for the purpose of
obtaining additional public comment and shall be legislative in
nature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
461.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
